title: inventory app
description: An e-commerce fullstack website that allows the user to view, create, update and delete items. Features a homepage, a products route and a categories route. This was created with NextJS, MongoDB and TailwindCSS.

title: movie search
description: Effortlessly find your favorite movies using the powerful search feature of this website. This was created with themoviedb.org API, React and CSS. This website was styled in the same vain as Netflix.

title: nav bar
description: A simple website showcasing responsive design. Click the products and a menu pop-up appears. This was created with React and CSS.

title: tenzies
description: Play Tenzies, an exciting web-based game showcasing creativity and interactive gameplay. Tenzies is typically intended for a younger audience. This was created with React and CSS.
